titlestmt.titleproper: Ernest F. Tucker Architectural Papers circa 1928-1970.
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by MarcEdit

publicationstmt.publisher: Oregon Historical Society Davies Family Research Library

profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS (Describing Archives: A Content Standard)

repository.corpname: Oregon Historical Society, Davies Family Research Library

address.addressline: Oregon Historical Society Davies Family Research Library

physdesc.extent: .04 cubic feet (1 folder and 6 oversize folders)

did.abstract: Collection includes: Account sheets, 1933-1939 and 1960-1961, regarding clients and commissions, including information on work performed, fees, contractors and related matters; Drawings, blueprints, plans and specifications of several buildings in Oregon, primarily residences in Portland, ca. 1928-1970. Ernest F. Tucker (1900-1976) was a Portland, Oregon architect, principally a designer of residences.

bioghist.p: Ernest F. Tucker (1900-1976) was a Portland, Oregon architect, principally a designer of residences.

scopecontent.p: Collection includes: Account sheets, 1933-1939 and 1960-1961, regarding clients and commissions, including information on work performed, fees, contractors and related matters; Drawings, blueprints, plans and specifications of several buildings in Oregon, primarily residences in Portland, ca. 1928-1970.

acqinfo.p: Account sheetsgift of Mary Tucker Greeley, July 1979.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to the public.

userestrict.p: The Oregon Historical Society is the owner of the materials in the Research Library and makes available reproductions for research, publication, and other uses. Written permission must be obtained from the Research Library prior to any use of reproductions. The Society does not necessarily hold copyright to all the materials in the collections. In some cases, permission for use of reproductions may require seeking additional authorization from the copyright holders.

prefercite.p: Ernest F. Tucker Architectural Papers, Mss 3043, Oregon Historical Society Research Library.

controlaccess.subject: Architecture, Domestic -- Oregon -- Designs and plans.
